code: import React from'react';import{useTheme}from'../hooks/useTheme';import{SunIcon,MoonIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ThemeToggle=_ref=>{let{className=''}=_ref;const{theme,toggleTheme}=useTheme();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:toggleTheme,className:`toggle-switch ${theme==='dark'?'toggle-switch-active':'toggle-switch-inactive'} ${className}`,"aria-label":`Switch to ${theme==='dark'?'light':'dark'} mode`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"sr-only",children:"Toggle dark mode"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"toggle-switch-circle flex items-center justify-center",children:theme==='dark'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MoonIcon,{className:"h-3 w-3 text-primary-500"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SunIcon,{className:"h-3 w-3 text-yellow-500"})})]});};export default ThemeToggle;
